page.title: 05Educational visit
page.content: In the summer term,the older children from our school spend some time away from school at Field Centres. This year we visited Freiston Hall near Boston.The centre is used by schools to study the environment of the Lincolnshire coast. On Tuesday,we visited Freiston shore and saw an old hotel which used to be on the coast but now the land has been reclaimed and there are fields where the beach used to be. On Wednesday,we visited a windmill at Burgh le Marsh and the Church Farm Museum at Skegness.Then we collected fossils from the beach at Anderby Creek. On Thursday,we visited the docks and "The Stump" at Boston.
